title: QS Al-Baqarah 02:286
description: Our Lord! Lay not on us a burden like that which You did lay on those before us...

title: QS Al-Imran 03:8
description: Our Lord! Let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us...

title: QS Al-A'raf 07:23
description: Our Lord! We have wronged ourselves...

title: QS Al-Mu'minun 23:109
description: Our Lord! We have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us...
